newsitem.title: USA: N. American Tech registers shrs for resale.
newsitem.headline: N. American Tech registers shrs for resale.

text.p: North American Technologies Group Inc said Friday it has registered up to 31.1 million common and preferred shares for possible resale.
The company said 24.5 million of the registered shares are its Series F and G-1 convertible preferred stock. The rest are common shares, it said.
The company has about 28 million shares common stock outstanding, it said.
The registration statement was completed to satisfy contractual registration rights granted by the company, it said.
The company said it does not anticipate that preferred holders will convert their shares for resale in the near future.
It said it will not receive the proceeds from the sale of any common shares sold by stockholders pursuant to the registration.
